data.actual_result: A message saying "Either the app is not running on this computer or no new accounts were detected, kthx"
data.expected_result: Linking Skype to your Discord Account
data.short_description: Not able to link Skype account in Discord. Windows 8
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Discord Open and Skype uninstalled - Download and Install Skype with the official exe file - Open Skype and login into it - Go to Discord and open Settings > Connections - Click Skype - All the steps before work also with battle net and stays after computer restart.
